"You're a bright girl you can figure it out." he was out of ideas at 
the moment on how to deal with the tyrant. The only other option was 
clear to him, he picked up his decimator rifle, rubbing it as if he 
were oiling an old style rifle. The only other option would be to 
destroy Megatron and make it look like Kit Kats orders. By Predacon 
law she would then become leader and he would be out of danger.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::KitKat::
> 
> She looks at Megatron, but responds to Phobia,"How?"
> 
> She turned and looked at Rowdy.  She couldn't leave him like that.
> She wondered if there was even a way to save Rowdy from the Vok 
> technology.  
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > Phobias baby relayed the shake back to him
> > "Good girl now find a reason to get away from the maniac and get 
> here 
> > quickly as possible."
> > he turned and walked back to the transport bay replacing the lock 
> on 
> > an open crate. "computer activate all security locks to my 
signal." 
> > the computer clicked and whired as the security protocals locked 
> into 
> > place. If he was going to have other Predacons on board he 
wouldn't 
> > have them snooping around.
> >
